data.blankContent: Marc's family did not go to university. He ____ the ____ in ____ family ____ study ____ a ____. He ____ to ____ university ____ our ____. He ____ to ____ a ____ one ____. Right now, he is studying Spanish and writing.
data.partBlankContent: Marc's family did not go to university. He w__ the fi___ in t__ family t_ study a_ a unive_____. He go__ to t__ university i_ our to__. He wa___ to b_ a tea____ one d__. Right now, he is studying Spanish and writing.
data.fullContent: Marc's family did not go to university. He was the first in the family to study at a university. He goes to the university in our town. He wants to be a teacher one day. Right now, he is studying Spanish and writing.
data.answer: 马克的家人没有上过大学。他是家里第一个上大学的。他在我们镇上上大学。他想有一天成为一名教师。现在，他正在学习西班牙语和写作。
